name: Magnet (Kdpx, AudioJim)
description:
Recommended to download the game, because the browser version might not perform as well

Made in a week for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1

Theme: Stronger Together

Controls: 

WASD - move

E - Turn Magnet On/Off

R - Rotate Objects

ESC - Pause

Credit:

Music and SFX - AudioJim

Programming - Kdpx

Made using Unity Top Down Engine
